snippet: The troops had been in charge of protecting a pipeline in the north that sends crude oil to international markets.
abstract: Militants in Iraq attack military barracks in remote area outside northern city of Mosul, killing 20 soldiers; attack mirrors two earlier assaults in same area.
lead_paragraph: The troops had been in charge of protecting a pipeline in the north that sends crude oil to international markets.

headline.main: 20 Iraqi Soldiers Are Killed in Barracks Attack
headline.print_headline: 20 Iraqi Soldiers Killed, Some Bound and Shot at Close Range
